attributes.review: This app made me realize that the president causes most, nearly all of my depression. If I could give a lower review, I would. Please don’t let him win for another four years. I’m begging y’all.
attributes.title: This app is horrible!

attributes.review: This man is trying to delete an app, where people from my generation have gained a lot of information about history that’ll never be taught in school, simply cause we hurt his feelings. He is not fit to be in office, someone who is infamously known world wide should not be our president. In fact, I don’t consider him to be my president, he’s just a rich man with great influence who somehow managed to come into power only to be used as a puppet. If you can’t even take your own SAT’s then you shouldn’t run a country 🤦🏾‍♀️
attributes.title: Shouldn’t be in office 😐

attributes.review: i really thought trump would keep america great by staying true to his core values but this app has shown be that he is pushing too liberal of an agenda by appealing to the youth and trying to tear down the hard work he has paved the past four years. truly saddening.
